tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guided_rock_climbing_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_date DATE,
  guide_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  max_participants INT,
  current_participants INT
)

CREATE TABLE TourSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id INT,
  tour_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE guided_tours (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tour_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    tour_guide VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    booking_status VARCHAR(50),
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES guided_tours(tour_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_availability (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    capacity INT,
    available_date DATE,
    reserved_slots INT,
    remaining_slots INT
);

CREATE TABLE guided_rock_climbing_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255),
  tour_location VARCHAR(255),
  tour_guide VARCHAR(255),
  tour_difficulty INT,
  tour_capacity INT,
  tour_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tour_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  participant_email VARCHAR(255),
  participant_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE available_tour_dates (
  tour_id INT,
  tour_date DATE,
  available_slots INT
)

CREATE TABLE tour_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tours (tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  tour_description TEXT,
  tour_difficulty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  tour_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  tour_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL,
  tour_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE guides (guide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guide_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  guide_experience VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  guide_rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
  guide_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE bookings (booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id UUID NOT NULL,
  guide_id UUID NOT NULL,
  booking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  booking_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  booking_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  customer_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  customer_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE availability (availability_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guide_id UUID NOT NULL,
  tour_id UUID NOT NULL,
  available_date DATE NOT NULL,
  available_slots INT NOT NULL
)
